018package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer;
019
020import static java.lang.System.currentTimeMillis;
021import static javafx.application.Platform.runLater;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029import javafx.concurrent.ScheduledService;
030import javafx.concurrent.Task;
031import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
032import javafx.util.Duration;
033
034/**
035 *  The service that will update the time display.
036 *
037 *  @version $Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
038 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
039 *  @UMLGraph.link
040 *  @since 0.1.0
041 */
042@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
043@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
044public class TimeUpdateService extends ScheduledService<Void>
045{
046        /*---------------*\
047    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
048        \*---------------*/
049    /**
050     *  The task that will update the time display.
051     *
052     *  @version $Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
053     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
054     *  @UMLGraph.link
055     *  @since 0.1.0
056     */
057    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
058    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
059    private class TimeUpdateTask extends Task<Void>
060    {
061            /*--------------*\
062        ====** Constructors **=================================================
063            \*--------------*/
064        /**
065         *  Creates a new {@code TimeUpdateTask} instance.
066         */
067        public TimeUpdateTask() { /* Just exists */ }
068
069            /*---------*\
070        ====** Methods **======================================================
071            \*---------*/
072        /**
073         *  {@inheritDoc}
074         */
075        @Override
076        public final Void call()
077        {
078            final var currentTime = currentTimeMillis();
079            final var remainingTime = currentTime < m_EndTime ? m_EndTime - currentTime : 0L;
080            runLater( () -> m_TimeDisplay.setText( format( "%3.1f", remainingTime / 1000.0 ) ) );
081            if( (remainingTime <= 0L) || m_Stop ) cancel();
082
083            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
084            return null;
085        }   //  call()
086    }
087    //  class TimeUpdateTask
088
089        /*------------*\
090    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
091        \*------------*/
092    /**
093     *  The end time.
094     */
095    private final long m_EndTime;
096
097    /**
098     *  The flag that stops the service.
099     */
100    private boolean m_Stop = false;
101
102    /**
103     *  The reference for the node that displays the time.
104     */
105    private final TextField m_TimeDisplay;
106
107        /*--------------*\
108    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
109        \*--------------*/
110    /**
111     *  Creates a new {@code TimeUpdateService} instance.
112     *
113     *  @param  endTime The end time.
114     *  @param  timeDisplay The reference for the node that displays the time.
115     */
116    public TimeUpdateService( final long endTime, final TextField timeDisplay )
117    {
118        m_EndTime = endTime;
119        m_TimeDisplay = requireNonNullArgument( timeDisplay, "timeDisplay" );
120        setPeriod( new Duration( 100 ) );
121    }   //  TimeUpdateService()
122
123        /*---------*\
124    ====** Methods **==========================================================
125        \*---------*/
126    /**
127     *  Stops the service.
128     */
129    public final void stop() { m_Stop = true; }
130
131    /**
132     *  {@inheritDoc}
133     */
134    @Override
135    protected final Task<Void> createTask() { return new TimeUpdateTask(); }
136}
137//  class TimeUpdateService
138
139/*
140 *  End of File
141 */
